text_block_list.text: It was Sunday. I was out doing my shopping when…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Well, well, if it isn't my dear trainer.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Are you here to carry my bags for me? 
Hahaha, very good! Hop to it, then, come on!
choice_data_list: Actually I'm just here to do my own shopping…
Actually I'm just here to do my own shopping…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Come now, I'll allow you to do both! I don't mind! 
I am, after all, a kind and understanding horsegirl.

And so I ended up accompanying Agnes 
Tachyon as she did her shopping.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You know, a single tomato contains a surprising amount of 
nutrients. In an ideal world that would be enough, but this 
imperfect body demands so much more…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Let's get tomatoes… and three steamed chicken fillets. Muscle 
growth is impossible without adequate protein intake.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, what an absolute bore. If only we could live on dietary 
supplements, then we wouldn't have to waste time worrying about 
all this food nonsense.
choice_data_list: But supplements don't taste of anything…
But supplements don't taste of anything…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
And? The purpose of eating is to replenish 
the body's supply of nutrients.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
The major nutrient types can be digested raw. Licopin and such 
can be obtained most readily from processed food products.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
As if I would have time for "cookery". I just buy what I need, 
throw it in the mixer, and drink it down.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I do not wish to spend any more time than necessary on the 
optional processes around food consumption. Because time, 
my dear, is a finite resource.

The more I heard about Agnes Tachyon's dietary 
habits, the more worried I became.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
If only the cafeteria were open 24 hours, I wouldn't have to 
trouble myself with food shopping at all…
choice_data_list: How about I make you something?
How about I make you something?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
"Make"? You? Such dedication! I don't know 
whether to be impressed or disgusted.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Could it be that over the course of our many experiments, you 
have developed some kind of addiction to serving me?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Alright, you're on. As long as I don't have 
to do anything, I think it's a fine idea.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Very well then. You can begin be preparing 
my dinner tonight. Don't hold back, now!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and don't try to fob me off with a load of empty calories. I 
trust you will give due consideration to nutritional balance.
And that's how I ended up preparing Agnes Tachyon's dinner.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Why on earth did you call me out here at this ungodly hour?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's right! I was so engrossed in my research 
that I scarcely noticed the time.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I decided to go back to basics, you see. I realized that if we 
wish for a horsegirl to travel at light speed, we must consider 
her momentum not classically but as a Lorentz-covariant four- 
vector! And…
choice_data_list: L… let's talk about that after you've eaten…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Alright, alright, no need to get worked up. I just mean to say 
that my work is progressing well. You'll have to wait a little 
longer until I can test these theories on you, but… well, 
that's something for you to look forward to!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I'll take that back to the lab with me. There is still much to do 
before I can retire for the night.
Then, the next morning…
(rattle)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Morning, trainer. Here, let me give you these back.

Agnes Tachyon pressed the empty food trays 
from the previous night into my hands.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Vitamins, minerals, protein, fat, sugar… All present and correct, 
and in appropriate quantities. Well done.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
It was fine. However, considering this particular 
use case, I will suggest two improvements.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Number one. It is most inconvenient to use chopsticks while 
conducting my tests. Do something about that.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Number two. Not enough rice in proportion to the other 
items. Add more to correct this imbalance.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I appreciate it's too late for today, but be sure to implement 
these improvements from tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Today's breakfast, of course. You DID bring it, didn't you?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I need to hurry back to the lab. Quickly now, hand it over.
choice_data_list: I don't have anything for you today.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: W… what did you just say!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
No breakfast? Is this supposed to be some kind of 
JOKE!? And after I interrupted my research to drag 
myself all the way here to collect it…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Did you or did you not promise to prepare my food for me?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Huh—!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Are you telling me that I am to negotiate every 
meal with you ahead of time? How inefficient!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Your job is to look after my needs! Now hurry up! Feed me!
choice_data_list: Alright, I'll get you something by lunch time!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Now. I am hungry now!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
This hunger can only be satiated by giving me my 
breakfast, or giving your body up for experimentation 
for the remainder of the morning.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: So… which will it be? Will you cook… or will you submit…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Very well. We'll just have to experiment on you 
this afternoon instead. For now, breakfast.
choice_data_list: Wait, you're going to experiment on me anyway!?
Wait, you're going to experiment on me anyway!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Naturally! That is a guinea pig's job, is it not? 
Just as managing my nutrition is a trainer's job.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
The cafeteria is so very, very far… until breakfast 
is ready, I believe I will take a nap.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, come now, I'm not asking much. I don't mind if 
you use whatever you have left over from yesterday. 
You do HAVE something left over, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hurry up. Come on. 
I said hurry! Get cooking, go!

It's good that she was finally getting a balanced diet… even if 
it meant I had to make all her meals for her…
